amendment.description: Amendment revises current law concerning the redesignation of foreign terrorist organizations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered two printed in House Report 108-561 to amend current law regarding designations of Foreign Terrorist Organization (FTO).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gallegly.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
